Text: I have uploaded the first DTFC DVD from 2005 on someones request. Enjoy! :)

I am NOT complaning! I am grateful as hell for getting this as you can se above. I just thinks its sad that people download this torrent and not seed it for a while. Its better for all - it will go faster!
